recipe_name: Pasta ai Pistacchi, Asparagi, e Panna
description: Pasta with Pistachios, Asparagus and cream sauce.

directions.step: Toast the Pistachios in a dry pan for 5-7 minutes, let cool set aside.
Cook the asparagus in a pot in boiling salt water over medium heat until tender. (about 3 minutes.)
Remove the asparagus and save the water in which to prepare the pasta. Bring the water back to boil.

Crush the clove of garlic with the side of a large knife, saute it in the butter in a pan on medium heat until the garlic begins to brown, then discard the clove. (press the garlic down with a wooden spoon while it's sauteing to squeeze out the juices.)
When the water boils, add the pasta.
Increase the heat, pour in the wine and let it cook off, stirring, for about a minute.
Reduce the heat back to medium and pour in the cream, and let simmer for about 2 minutes.
Season the sauce to taste with salt and pepper.
When the pasta is 'al dente' strain and add to the sauce.
Add the cheese and mix everything well.
Plate, season with freshly ground pepper and serve.
Pasta ai Pistacchi, Asparagi e Panna done.
